title: SMACK
req:
:sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: Deal 4 :def_icon: dmg

:
:sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: Deal 6 :def_icon: dmg


:sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: Deal 8 :def_icon: dmg/n/n

title: SMACK II
req:
:sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: Deal 5 :def_icon: dmg

:
:sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg


:sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: Deal 9 :def_icon: dmg
text: On 4-of-a-kind (#'s), this *Attack* becomes *undefendable*.

title: SMACK III
req:
:sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: Deal 6 :def_icon: dmg


:sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: Deal 8 :def_icon: dmg


:sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: :sword_die: Deal 10 :def_icon: dmg
text: On 4-of-a-kind (#'s), this *Attack* becomes *undefendable*.

title: STURDY BLOW
text: Deal 4 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: STURDY BLOW II
text: Deal 5 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: STURDY BLOW III
text: Deal 6 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: MIGHTY BLOW
text: Deal 9 :def_icon: dmg.

title: MIGHTY BLOW II
text: Deal 8 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: CRIT BASH
text:
Inflict *Stun* :stun_token:./n/n
Then deal 5 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: CRIT BASH II
text:
Inflict *Stun* :stun_token:./n/n
Then deal 7 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: FORTITUDE II
text: On 3-of-a-kind (#'s), you may also remove one status effect from yourself.

title: OVERPOWER
text:
Roll 3 :game_die:: Then deal dmg equal to the total roll value./n/n
If the roll value is at least 14 :def_icon:, inflict *Concussion* :concussion_token:.

title: OVERPOWER II
text:
Roll 3 :game_die:: Then deal dmg equal to the total roll value./n/n
If the roll value is at least 10 :def_icon:, inflict *Concussion* :concussion_token:.

title: RECKLESS
text:
Deal 15 :def_icon: dmg, receive 4 :und_icon: dmg in return./n/n
(*Return dmg only applies if at least 1 :def_icon: dmg was dealt successfully*)

title: RECKLESS II
text:
Deal 20 :def_icon: dmg, receive 5 :und_icon: dmg in return./n/n
(*Return dmg only applies if at least 1 :def_icon: dmg was dealt successfully*)

title: THICK SKIN
text: Heal 2 :heal_icon: x :life_die:.

title: THICK SKIN II
text:
Heal 2 :heal_icon: x :life_die:./n/n
On :life_die: :life_die:, you may also prevent 1 incoming status effect.

title: CONCUSS!
text: Inflict *Concussion* :concussion_token: on a chosen opponent.

title: HEAD BASH!
text: If you successfully dealt at least 8 :def_icon: dmg to an opponent after their defence concluded, play this card to inflict *Concussion* :concussion_token:.

title: GET SOME!
text: Roll 5 :game_die:: Add 1 :def_icon: x :sword_die: dmg. Inflict *Concussion* :concussion_token:.

title: FEELIN' GOOD!
text: Roll 3 :game_die:: Heal 1 :heal_icon: + 2 :heal_icon: x :life_die:.

title: ADRENALINE SURGE!
text:
Roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
On :pow_die:, heal 2 :heal_icon: and inflict *Concussion* :concussion_token: on a chosen opponent./n/n
On any other outcome, draw 1 :card_icon:.

title: RAGE!
text: Inflict *Stun* :stun_token:. Deal 15 :und_icon: dmg.

title: FERTILIZE
text: During your *Upkeep Phase*, grow 1 *Spirit*.

title: SPLINTER
req:
:branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: Deal 5 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: Deal 6 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
text: You may discard 1 *Spirit* to inflict *Barbed Vine* :barbed_vine_token:.

title: SPLINTER II
req:
:branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: Deal 5 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: Deal 6 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
text: Inflict *Barbed Vine* :barbed_vine_token:.

title: SPLINTER III
req:
:branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: Deal 5 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: Deal 6 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: :branch_die: Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
text:
On 3-of-a-kind (#'s), grow a *Spirit*./n/n
Inflict *Barbed Vine* :barbed_vine_token:.

title: TEND
text:
Draw 1 :card_icon:. Grow 3 *Spirits*./n/n
A chosen player gains *Wellspring* :wellspring_token:.
A chosen opponent is inflicted with *Barbed Vine* :barbed_vine_token:.

title: TEND II
text:
Draw 1 :card_icon:. Grow 4 *Spirits*./n/n
A chosen player gains *Wellspring* :wellspring_token:.
A chosen opponent is inflicted with *Barbed Vine* :barbed_vine_token:.

title: OVERGROWTH
text:
Deal 2 :def_icon: dmg. You may remove up to 2 *Spirits* to add 4 :def_icon: dmg per *Spirit* removed./n/n
You may discard *Wellspring* :wellspring_token: to make this *Attack undefendable*.

title: OVERGROWTH II
text:
Deal 4 :def_icon: dmg. You may remove up to 2 *Spirits* to add 4 :def_icon: dmg per *Spirit* removed./n/n
You may discard *Wellspring* :wellspring_token: to make this *Attack undefendable*.

title: VENGEFUL VINES
text:
Inflict *Barbed Vine* :barbed_vine_token:./n/n
Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg.

title: VENGEFUL VINES II
text:
Inflict *Barbed Vine* :barbed_vine_token:./n/n
Deal 8 :def_icon: dmg.

title: CALL OF THE WILD
text:
Deal 8 :def_icon: dmg & roll 4 :game_die::/n/n
Add 1 :def_icon: x :branch_die: dmg./n/n
On :leaf_die:, gain *Wellspring* :wellspring_token:./n/n
Grow 1 x :spirit_die: *Spirits*.

title: CALL OF THE WILD II
text:
Deal 8 :def_icon: dmg & roll 5 :game_die::/n/n
Add 1 :def_icon: x :branch_die: dmg./n/n
On :leaf_die:, gain *Wellspring* :wellspring_token:./n/n
Grow 1 x :spirit_die: *Spirits*.

title: NATURE'S GRASP
text:
Grow 2 *Spirits*./n/n
Then deal 5 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg + 1 :und_icon: dmg per *Spirit*.

title: NATURE'S GRASP II
text:
Grow 2 *Spirits*./n/n
Then deal 6 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg + 1 :und_icon: dmg per *Spirit*.

title: ROOTED
text:
Prevent 1 :prevent_icon: x :branch_die: + 1 :prevent_icon: x :spirit_icon: dmg./n/n
On :leaf_die: :leaf_die:, grow a *Spirit*.

title: ROOTED II
text:
Prevent 1 :prevent_icon: x :branch_die: + 1 :prevent_icon: x :spirit_icon: dmg./n/n
On :leaf_die: :leaf_die:, grow a *Spirit*./n/n
On :spirit_die: :spirit_die:, a chosen player gains *Wellspring* :wellspring_token:.

title: WAKE THE FOREST!
text:
You and a chosen teammate gain *Wellspring* :wellspring_token:./n/n
Grow 5 *Spirits*. Inflict *Barbed Vine* :barbed_vine_token:. Then deal 10 :und_icon: dmg.

title: HARVEST!
text:
Remove up to 3 *Spirits* and gain 1 :cp_icon: per *Spirit* removed./n/n
If at least 2 were removed, up to two chosen players gain *Wellspring* :wellspring_token:.

title: CULTIVATE!
text: Grow 3 *Spirits*.

title: WILL O' WISP!
text:
Roll 3 :game_die::/n/n
On :branch_die:, deal 1 :und_icon: *collateral* dmg to all opponents./n/n
On :leaf_die:, gain *Wellspring* :wellspring_token:./n/n
On :spirit_die:, grow 1 *Spirit*.

title: DOWN POUR!
text: You may grow all exisiting *Spirits* once each *(in any order)*.

title: STOMP!
text:
Roll 5 :game_die:/n/n
Add 1 :def_icon: x :branch_die: dmg./n/n
If at least 3 :def_icon: dmg was added, inflict *Barbed Vine* :barbed_vine_token.

title: DRINK DEEP!
text: A chosen player gains *Wellspring* :wellspring_token:.

title: MOTHER TREE!
text:
Roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
On :spirit_die:, grow 4 *Spirits*./n/n
On any other outcome, draw 1 :card_icon:.

title: SLASH
req:
:ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: Deal 5 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: Deal 6 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg/n/n

title: SLASH II
req:
:ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: Deal 4 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: Deal 6 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: :ninjato_die: Deal 8 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
text: On 3-of-a-kind (#'s), gain *Ninjutsu* :ninjutsu_token:.

title: DEATH BLOSSOM
text:
Roll 5 :game_die::/n/n
Deal 1 :def_icon: x :ninjato_die: + 2 :def_icon: x :shuriken_die: dmg./n/n
On :mask_die:, this *Attack* becomes *undefendable*.

title: DEATH BLOSSOM II
text:
Roll 5 :game_die::/n/n
Deal 1 :def_icon: x :ninjato_die: + 2 :def_icon: x :shuriken_die: dmg./n/n
On :mask_die:, this *Attack* becomes *undefendable*./n/n
On :mask_die: :mask_die:, inflict *Delayed Poison* :delayed_poison_token:./n/n
You may re-roll up to two of these dice.

title: SMOKE SCREEN
text:
A chosen player gains *Smoke Bomb* :smoke_bomb_token: and 2 *Ninjutsu* :ninjutsu_token:./n/n
A chosen opponent is inflicted with *Delayed Poison* :delayed_poison_token:.

title: SMOKE SCREEN II
text:
A chosen player gains *Smoke Bomb* :smoke_bomb_token: and 3 *Ninjutsu* :ninjutsu_token:./n/n
A chosen opponent is inflicted with *Delayed Poison* :delayed_poison_token:.
text_b: Deal 4 :und_icon: *pure* dmg to two chosen opponents *(may choose the same opponent twice)*.

title: WALK THE LINE
text:
Roll 2 :game_die: and deal dmg equal to the total roll value./n/n
If the final roll value is 6 or less, this *Attack* becomes *undefendable*.

title: WALK THE LINE II
text:
Roll 2 :game_die: and deal dmg equal to the total roll value./n/n
You may re-roll one of these dice./n/n
If the final roll value is 6 or less, this *Attack* becomes *undefendable*.
text_b: Roll 1 :game_die:: Deal *pure* dmg equal to the roll value.

title: POISON BLADE
text:
Inflict *Delayed Poison* :delayed_poison_token:./n/n
Deal 5 :def_icon: dmg.

title: POISON BLADE II
text:
Roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
On :ninjato_die:, inflict *Delayed Poison* :delayed_poison_token:./n/n
On :shuriken_die: or :mask_die:, inflict 2 *Delayed Poison* :delayed_poison_token:./n/n
Deal 5 :def_icon: dmg.

title: SHADOW FANG
text:
Gain 2 *Ninjutsu* :ninjutsu_token:./n/n
Then deal 8 :def_icon: dmg.

title: SHADOW FANG II
text:
Gain *Smoke Bomb* :smoke_bomb_token: and 2 *Ninjutsu* :ninjutsu_token:./n/n
Then deal 8 :def_icon: dmg.

title: SHADEWALK
text:
Gain *Smoke Bomb* :smoke_bomb_token:./n/n
Inflict *Delayed Poison* :delayed_poison_token:./n/n
Deal 6 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: SHADEWALK II
text:
Gain *Smoke Bomb* :smoke_bomb_token:./n/n
Inflict 2 *Delayed Poison* :delayed_poison_token:./n/n
Deal 5 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.
text_b: Gain 3 *Ninjutsu* :ninjutsu_token:. Inflict *Delayed Poison* :delayed_poison_token: on a chosen opponent.

title: SHADE SHIFT
text:
On :ninjato_die:, deal 1 :und_icon: dmg./n/n
On :shuriken_die:, deal 2 :und_icon: dmg./n/n
On :mask_die: :mask_die:, gain *Smoke Bomb* :smoke_bomb_token:./n/n
You may re-roll one of these dice.

title: SHADE SHIFT II
text:
Deal 1 :und_icon: x :ninjato_die: dmg./n/n
On :shuriken_die:, deal 2 :und_icon: dmg./n/n
On :mask_die: :mask_die:, gain *Smoke Bomb* :smoke_bomb_token:./n/n
You may re-roll up to two of these dice.

title: ASSASSINATE!
text:
Inflict *Delayed Poison* :delayed_poison_token: on two chosen opponents *(may be the same opponent)*/n/n
Gain *Smoke Bomb* :smoke_bomb_token:. Deal 10 :und_icon: dmg.

title: POISON DART!
text: Inflict *Delayed Poison* :delayed_poison_token: on a chosen opponent.

title: THROWING STARS!
text:
Roll 5 :game_die::/n/n
Add 1 :def_icon: x :shuriken_die: dmg./n/n
You may re-roll up to five of these dice.

title: FAN OF KNIVES!
text: Deal 1 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg to three chosen opponents *(may choose the same opponent multiple times)*.

title: SMOKE OFFERING!
text: If you discard 1 :card_icon:, a chosen player gains *Smoke Bomb* :smoke_bomb_token:.

title: TRAIN!
text: Gain *Ninjutsu* :ninjutsu_token:.

title: ESCAPE!
text:
*Play only after being Attacked.*/n/n
Roll 1 :game_die:/n/n
On :ninjato_die:, prevent 1 :prevent_icon: dmg./n/n
On :shuriken_die:, prevent 2 :prevent_icon: dmg./n/n
On :mask_die:, gain *Smoke Bomb* :smoke_bomb_token:.

title: DOJO!
text:
Roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
On :mask_die:, gain *Smoke Bomb* :smoke_bomb_ token: and 2 *Ninjutsu* :ninjutsu_token:./n/n
On any other outcome, draw 1 :card_icon:.

title: REVOLVER
req:
:bullet_die: :bullet_die: :bullet_die: Deal 3 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:bullet_die: :bullet_die: :bullet_die: :bullet_die: Deal 4 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:bullet_die: :bullet_die: :bullet_die::bullet_die: :bullet_die: Deal 5 :def_icon: dmg/n/n

title: REVOLVER II
req:
:bullet_die: :bullet_die: :bullet_die: Deal 4 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:bullet_die: :bullet_die: :bullet_die: :bullet_die: Deal 5 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:bullet_die: :bullet_die: :bullet_die::bullet_die: :bullet_die: Deal 6 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
text: On 4-of-a-kind (#'s), inflict *Knockdown* :knockdown_token:.

title: BOUNTY HUNTER
text:
Inflict *Bounty* :bounty_token:./n/n
Then deal 1 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: BOUNTY HUNTER II
text:
Inflict *Bounty* :bounty_token:./n/n
Then deal 2 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: SHOWDOWN
text:
After targeting an opponent, you each roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
If your roll is equal or greater, deal 7 :def_icon: dmg, otherwise deal 5 :def_icon: dmg.

title: SHOWDOWN II
text:
After targeting an opponent, you each roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
If your roll is equal or greater, deal 8 :def_icon: dmg, otherwise deal 6 :def_icon: dmg.

title: SHOWDOWN III
text:
After targeting an opponent, you each roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
If your roll is equal or greater, deal 9 :def_icon: dmg, otherwise deal 6 :def_icon: dmg.

title: FAN THE HAMMER
text:
Gain 2 *Evasive* :evasive_token:./n/n
Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg.

title: FAN THE HAMMER II
text:
Gain 2 *Evasive* :evasive_token:./n/n
Deal 8 :def_icon: dmg.

title: TAKE COVER
text:
Gain *Evasive* :evasive_token:./n/n
Deal 5 :def_icon: dmg.

title: TAKE COVER II
text:
Gain *Evasive* :evasive_token:./n/n
Deal 6 :def_icon: dmg.

title: DEADEYE
text:
Inflict *Knockdown* :knockdown_token:./n/n
Deal 6 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: DEADEYE II
text:
Inflict *Knockdown* :knockdown_token:./n/n
Deal 8 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.
text_b: Gain*Evasive* :evasive_token:. Inflict *Bounty* :bounty_token: & *Knockdown* :knockdown_token: on up to two chosen opponents..

title: DUEL
text:
You and your attacker each roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
If your roll is greater, you may choose to either deal 3 :und_icon: dmg or prevent  :prevent_icon: dmg *(rounded up)*./n/n
If your roll is not greater, deal 1 :und_icon: dmg.

title: DUEL II
text:
You and your attacker each roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
If your roll is equal or greater, you may choose to either deal 3 :und_icon: dmg or prevent  :prevent_icon: dmg *(rounded up)*./n/n
If your roll is less, deal 1 :und_icon: dmg.

title: QUICK DRAW
text: During your *Upkeep Phase*, gain *Reload* :reload_token:.

title: QUICK DRAW II
text:
During your *Upkeep Phase*, gain *Reload* :reload_token:./n/n
When you spend a *Reload* :reload_token:, you may re-roll that die one time.

title: FILL'EM WITH LEAD!
text:
Gain *Evasive* :evasive_token:. Inflict *Bounty :bounty_token: & Knockdown* :knockdown_token. Then deal 10 :und_icon: dmg./n/n
If you spend a *Reload* :reload_token:, you may re-roll that die one time.

title: WANTED!
text: Inflict *Bounty* :bounty_token: on a chosen opponent.

title: SPIN THE CHAMBER!
text: Gain *Reload* :reload_token:.

title: ROULETTE!
text:
Choose a player and then roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
On :bullet_die:, deal 2 :und_icon: dmg./n/n
On :dash_die:, inflict *Knockdown* :knockdown_token:./n/n
On :bullseye_die:, inflict *Bounty* :bounty_token:.

title: WILD WEST!
text:
When you spend a *Reload* :reload_token:, you may re-roll that die one time./n/n
If you do, add an additional 1 :def_icon: dmg to the outcome.

title: EAT LEAD!
text:
Roll 5 :game_die::/n/n
Add 1 :def_icon: x :bullet_die: to the total dmg./n/n
If at least 4 :def_icon: dmg was added, inflict *Knockdown* :knockdown_token:.

title: RUN AND GUN!
text:
Roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
On :bullseye_die:, inflict *Bounty* :bounty_token: & *Knockdown* :knockdown_token: on a chosen opponent./n/n
On any other outcome, draw 1 :card_icon:.

title: KATANA SLICE
req:
:katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: Deal 5 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: Deal 6 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg/n/n

title: KATANA SLICE II
req:
:katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: Deal 6 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: Deal 8 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
text: On 4-of-a-kind (#'s), inflict *Shame* :shame_token:.

title: KATANA SLICE III
req:
:katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: Deal 6 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
:katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: :katana_die: Deal 8 :def_icon: dmg/n/n
text: On 3-of-a-kind (#'s), inflict *Shame* :shame_token:.

title: BUSHIDO
text:
If you are the first player of the game, gain *Honor* :honor_token:./n/n
At the conclusion of your turn, if you used less than 3 rolls during your *Offensive Roll Phase*, gain *Honor* :honor_token:.

title: WAKIZASHI
text:
Gain *Back Strike* :back_strike_token:./n/n
Deal 3 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: WAKIZASHI II
text:
Gain *Back Strike* :back_strike_token:./n/n
Deal 4 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: WAKIZASHI III
text:
Gain *Back Strike* :back_strike_token:./n/n
Inflict *Shame* :shame_token:./n/n
Deal 4 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: SOLEMNITY
text:
Inflict *Shame* :shame_token:./n/n 
Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg.

title: SOLEMNITY II
text:
Inflict 2 *Shame* :shame_token:./n/n 
Deal 8 :def_icon: dmg.

title: BUDO
text:
Gain *Honor* :honor_token:./n/n
Then deal 6 :def_icon: dmg.

title: BUDO II
text:
Gain *Honor* :honor_token:./n/n
Then deal 8 :def_icon: dmg.

title: MASAMUNE
text:
Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg & roll 4 :game_die::/n/n
Add 1 :def_icon: x :katana_die: dmg./n/n
Inflict 1 x :kabuto_die: *Shame* :shame_token:./n/n
On :rising_sun_die:, gain *Back Strike* :back_strike_token:.

title: MASAMUNE II
text:
Deal 7 :def_icon: dmg & roll 5 :game_die::/n/n
Add 1 :def_icon: x :katana_die: dmg./n/n
Inflict 1 x :kabuto_die: *Shame* :shame_token:./n/n
On :rising_sun_die:, gain *Back Strike* :back_strike_token:.

title: HAGAKURE
text:
Gain *Honor* :honor_token:./n/n
Gain *Back Strike* :back_strike_token:./n/n
Inflict 2 *Shame* :shame_token:./n/n
Then deal 5 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: HAGAKURE II
text:
Gain *Honor* :honor_token:./n/n
Gain *Back Strike* :back_strike_token:./n/n
Inflict 2 *Shame* :shame_token:./n/n
Then deal 7 :und_icon: *undefendable* dmg.

title: STAND TALL
text:
Deal 1 :und_icon: x :katana_die: dmg./n/n
Prevent 1 :prevent_icon: x :kabuto_die: dmg./n/n
On :rising_sun_die:, prevent 2 :prevent_icon: dmg./n/n
/n/n
If no :kabuto_die: or :rising_sun_die: were rolled, gain *Shame* :shame_token: (*Shame* yourself).

title: STAND TALL II
text:
Deal 1 :und_icon: x :katana_die: dmg./n/n
Prevent 1 :prevent_icon: x :kabuto_die: dmg./n/n
On :rising_sun_die:, prevent 2 :prevent_icon: dmg./n/n

title: SHOGUN!
text: Gain *Honor* :honor_token:. Inflict 2 *Shame* :shame_token:. Then Deal 13 :und_icon: dmg.

title: HONORABLE!
text: Gain 2 *Honor* :honor_token:

title: SHAME ON YOU!
text: Inflict 2 *Shame* :shame_token: on chosen opponent.

title: DON'T BACK DOWN!
text: Gain *Back Strike* :back_strike_token:.

title: GISHI!
text:
Roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
On :katana_die:, add 2 :def_icon: dmg./n/n
On :kabuto_die:, inflict 2 *Shame* :shame_token:./n/n
On :rising_sun_die:, gain *Back Strike* :back_strike_token:.

title: FOLLOW THROUGH!
text:
Roll 5 :game_die::/n/n
Add 1 :def_icon: x :katana_die: dmg.n/n
Inflict *Shame* :shame_token:.

title: KENSEI!
text:
Roll 1 :game_die::/n/n
On :rising_sun_die:, gain *Backstrike* :back_strike_token: & 2 *Honor* :honor_token:./n/n
On any other outcome, draw 1 :card_icon:.
